description: Create a business unit laborer link.
permissions: User must be authorized to create links for the related business unit; create permission is delegated to the business unit policy, which requires practical admin access to the broker that owns the business unit.
side_effects: Creates a business unit laborer link record.
validation_notes: --business-unit and --laborer are required. Business unit and laborer must belong to the same broker. A laborer can only be linked once per business unit.
